about_the_game:
Groove to the official Leximan soundtrack and fill your days with retro bops and witchy beats to drink coffee to. Enjoy over 100 minutes of something I can only refer to as sound. Will it change your life? Will it make you feel like a behatted misfit in a school of magic? Will it make you do a little spin in your chair? Yes. Yes it will.

Once purchased, you will find the OST MP3s in your Steam Library. Lucky Steam Library.
